analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave antarāmalāḥ antarāamittāḥ antarāsapattāḥ antarāvadhakāḥ antarāpaccatthikā

original: Lobho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko.
analyzed: lobhaḥ bhikkhave antarā amalaḥ antarā amittaḥ antarā sapatto antarā vadhakaḥ antarā paccatthiko

original: Doso, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko.
analyzed: dosaḥ bhikkhave antarā amalaḥ antarā amittaḥ antarā sapatto antarā vadhakaḥ antarā paccatthiko

original: Moho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko.
analyzed: mohaḥ bhikkhave antarā amalaḥ antarā amittaḥ antarā sapatto antarā vadhakaḥ antarā paccatthiko

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayaḥ antara amalāḥ antara amittāḥ antara sapattāḥ antara a vadhakāḥ antara a paccatthikā ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
